sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		RecordCount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1
